General.Name: Shenzhen Beauty Star Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. provides plastic packaging solutions in China and internationally. It also offers technology innovation services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Beauty Star Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 1001, Longgang Avenue (Ping Lot), Shenzhen, China, 518117
